sense.def:
Mnenje, lastnost ali stvar je
personal
, kadar pripada določeni osebi ali se nanaša nanjo.

seg.quote: My personal view is that he should resign.

sense.def:
To give something one's personal attention
pomeni z nečim se ukvarjata osebno in tistega ne prepustiti drugim.

seg.quote: The book was translated under the personal supervision of the author.

sense.def:
Zadeve, ki so
personal
, se nanašajo na človekova čustva, odnose in zdravje.

seg.quote: ...the most intimate details of their personal lives.

sense.def:
Pripombe, ki so
personal
, se nanašajo na človekov videz ali značaj in so žaljive.

seg.quote: I think we're getting too personal.
